title: List of all Android jar  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android jar  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: quickblox-android-sdk
repoList.description: QuickBlox Android SDK includes code snippets with main use cases and framework JAR library.

repoList.name: Tor_Onion_Proxy_Library
repoList.description: Provides a JAR and an AAR for embedding the Tor Onion Proxy into a Java or Android Program

repoList.name: SwipeActionAdapter
repoList.description: The Mailbox-like Swipe gesture library for Android

repoList.name: MakeJar
repoList.description: A demo for android make library jar

repoList.name: unused-My-Wallet-V3-jar
repoList.description: Deprecated. Now lives here: https://github.com/blockchain/My-Wallet-V3-Android/tree/master/wallet

repoList.name: AndroidSupportLibrary
repoList.description: android support支持库for Eclipse，包含design v7包下面的appcompat、cardview、recyclerview等库的源码，不是jar包，使用Eclipse同学的福音。

repoList.name: Android-Volley-library
repoList.description: Include volley as jar dependency in your pom.xml or build.gradle

repoList.name: Kairos-SDK-Android
repoList.description: The Android client for the Kairos Face Recognition API. Includes example Facial Recognition project and SDK jar library.

repoList.name: UASDKInter
repoList.description: Unity使用Plugins方式接入Android 渠道SDK的通用框架，使用中间件jar包的形式调用各种渠道SDK，包括Library。

repoList.name: dexlazyloader
repoList.description: Library and Plugin to load jars dinamically on Android
